# couchbase-capella_app_endpoint_oidc_provider (Resource)

App Endpoint OpenID Connect Provider Resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_endpoint_name` (String)
- `app_service_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the appService.
- `client_id` (String)
- `cluster_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the cluster.
- `issuer` (String)
- `organization_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the organization.
- `project_id` (String) The GUID4 ID of the project.

### Optional

- `discovery_url` (String)
- `register` (Boolean)
- `roles_claim` (String)
- `user_prefix` (String)
- `username_claim` (String)

### Read-Only

- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `provider_id` (String) The unique identifier of the provider.
